title: Evolving Roles of Librarians and Instructional Design Strategies in Online Educational Environments for K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of library services and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on redefining librariansâ€™ roles in online education ecosystems, centered on K-12 educational changes.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more new roles of librarians in online learning environments (e.g., information curator, content designer).
Learners can design and implement digital resource integration strategies in response to changes in educational standards within a simulated environment.
Learners can develop online information literacy education modules that enhance learner engagement in VR-based scenarios.
